医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
随着人工智能眼科检查证明其价值，未来技术的经验教训也随之出现南加州一家药物治疗提供商的主管克里斯蒂安·埃斯皮诺萨 (Christian Espinoza) 最近开始使用一个强大的新助手：一种人工智能算法，可以利用视网膜相机拍摄的照片进行眼科检查。它无需医生在场即可快速诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/As-AI-eye-exams-prove-their-worth-lessons-for-future-tech-emerge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/As-AI-eye-exams-prove-their-worth-lessons-for-future-tech-emerge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13c00ad7-a17b-48a0-a9de-1164f51ed92b Wed, 27 Mar 2024 08:08:52 -0400 As AI eye exams prove their worth, lessons for future tech emerge

MMR 疫苗减少了幼儿的抗生素使用：北欧研究揭示了更广泛的益处研究表明，两岁以下儿童接种三剂 DTaP 后接种 MMR 疫苗可显着减少抗生素治疗的需求，凸显了潜在的非特异性保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/MMR-vaccine-slashes-antibiotic-use-in-toddlers-Nordic-study-shines-light-on-broader-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/MMR-vaccine-slashes-antibiotic-use-in-toddlers-Nordic-study-shines-light-on-broader-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b929b660-109b-43c7-9456-c01e009619cc Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:55:00 -0400 MMR vaccine slashes antibiotic use in toddlers: Nordic study shines light on broader benefits
研究揭示了吸烟成瘾中基因的相互作用第一次吸一口尼古丁，您的 DNA 与社会和环境因素一起，在塑造接下来发生的事情中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-sheds-light-on-the-interplay-of-genes-in-smoking-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-sheds-light-on-the-interplay-of-genes-in-smoking-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05fb97b8-7665-48e6-9b43-ee42eaba0aaf Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Study sheds light on the interplay of genes in smoking addiction
关注NSCLC治疗中的致癌驱动突变和耐药机制肺癌是全球癌症相关死亡的主要原因。对非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 驱动突变的了解不断加深，为晚期患者提供了更多针对生物标志物的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Focusing-on-oncogenic-driver-mutations-and-resistance-mechanisms-in-the-treatment-of-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Focusing-on-oncogenic-driver-mutations-and-resistance-mechanisms-in-the-treatment-of-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a32796ec-000d-4a85-91b5-11d3339c128a Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:47:22 -0400 Focusing on oncogenic driver mutations and resistance mechanisms in the treatment of NSCLC
持续锻炼可以改善睡眠并减少失眠发表于《2019 年》的一项为期 10 年的国际研究表明，长期坚持每周锻炼 2-3 次可以降低目前的失眠风险，并且能够按照建议的每晚闭眼 6-9 小时的时间进行锻炼。开放获取期刊 BMJ Open。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Consistent-exercise-improves-sleep-and-reduces-insomnia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Consistent-exercise-improves-sleep-and-reduces-insomnia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58a8cc19-70ea-42c6-9b60-18bd66495bdc Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:35:17 -0400 Consistent exercise improves sleep and reduces insomnia
基于人工智能的分析发现两种植物提取物具有作为 GLP-1 激动剂减肥药的潜力欧洲肥胖大会 (ECO 2024)（5 月 12 日至 15 日，威尼斯）将在一项基于 AI（人工智能）的研究中鉴定出两种具有作为 GLP-1 激动剂减肥药潜力的植物化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/AI-based-analysis-uncovers-two-plant-extracts-with-potial-as-GLP-1-agonist-weight-loss-pills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/AI-based-analysis-uncovers-two-plant-extracts-with-potial-as-GLP-1-agonist-weight-loss-pills.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc3d9c67-4b80-4293-b441-23945d6c7a44 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:30:11 -0400 AI-based analysis uncovers two plant extracts with potential as GLP-1 agonist weight loss pills
